channel.title: Base V3
channel.description:
My spelling is not very good.
DONT FORGET TO SETUP SQL
Its meh again,, Sipsik12
IF U DONT KNOW HOW TO RUN THIS GO TO:
i highly suggest that u use this as your base this will my coding team and my be updating almost every day!
We are working hard on 474 server whith succes
We have seen nice download rates on uppit.com so we still make new versions!
Updatlogs v3.0 Special attack goes now always off when u equip a weapon Cleaned rsplayer some not much When u equip the like a godsword u see the special When u equip a weapon right interface is showed like slash,crush etc(not all wepons added) Skillcape emote is now used to turn on your skill cape (like real rs) Fixed crash bug Edited some packets and voids to work better Fixed Sendmessage(not tested yet but we think it works now) Added Interface Command example ::interface 0 77 to test interfaces - Lumby Skillcapes now got a command to spawn :: skillcape :: skillcape2 U can now always login and never says your alrdy online etc Deleted a bugged packet Changed some ''small'' details
Updatlogs v2.0 Added house options frame click on the house in your interface! Added Mypos command for coordiantes type ::mypos and in your bat file coords are showed Added Some npcs just for some testing Cleaned some code Fixed again an npc loading bug Vengance -Songoty Deleted your computer is to slow so evryone can run this! so evryone can use my source
Updatlogs V1.0 Attack tab - Link Emotions -Pharmacy Npcs loads from config file Fixed bugs Packets Works now better Fixed crash bugs Fixed already logged in bug Sever Works now alot faster Npcs that are loaded from config file now has respawn function!
http://img65.imageshack.us/img65/9731/noplacelikehomeeh2.jpg http://img73.imageshack.us/img73/7660/houseoptionswx9.jpg
How to use the Skillcapes and godsword spec
wear a skillcape by :: skillcapes :: skillcapes2 then go to emotes and scroll down there u see an emote called skillcape click on it(u need to wear a cape first)
Wear a godsword and u do the special
Credits evryone listed in my update logs My and my Coding team

item.title: Base V3
item.dc:creator: @sipsik12 sipsik12
item.description:
@sipsik12 wrote:

My spelling is not very good.

DONT FORGET TO SETUP SQL

Its meh again, Sipsik12

IF U DONT KNOW HOW TO RUN THIS GO TO:

i highly suggest that u use this as your base this will my coding team and my be updating almost every day!

We are working hard on 474 server whith succes

We have seen nice download rates on uppit.com so we still make new versions!

Updatlogs v3.0
Special attack goes now always off when u equip a weapon
Cleaned rsplayer some not much
When u equip the like a godsword u see the special
When u equip a weapon right interface is showed like slash,crush etc(not all wepons added)
Skillcape emote is now used to turn on your skill cape (like real rs)
Fixed crash bug
Edited some packets and voids to work better
Fixed Sendmessage(not tested yet but we think it works now)
Added Interface Command example ::interface 0 77 to test interfaces - Lumby
Skillcapes now got a command to spawn :: skillcape :: skillcape2
U can now always login and never says your alrdy online etc
Deleted a bugged packet
Changed some ‘‘small’’ details

Updatlogs v2.0
Added house options frame click on the house in your interface!
Added Mypos command for coordiantes type ::mypos and in your bat file coords are showed
Added Some npcs just for some testing
Cleaned some code
Fixed again an npc loading bug
Vengance -Songoty
Deleted your computer is to slow so evryone can run this! so evryone can use my source

Updatlogs V1.0
Attack tab - Link
Emotions -Pharmacy
Npcs loads from config file
Fixed bugs
Packets Works now better
Fixed crash bugs
Fixed already logged in bug
Sever Works now alot faster
Npcs that are loaded from config file now has respawn function!

http://img65.imageshack.us/img65/9731/noplacelikehomeeh2.jpg
http://img73.imageshack.us/img73/7660/houseoptionswx9.jpg

How to use the Skillcapes and godsword spec

wear a skillcape by :: skillcapes :: skillcapes2 then go to emotes and scroll down there u see an emote called skillcape click on it(u need to wear a cape first)

Wear a godsword and u do the special

Credits
evryone listed in my update logs
My and my Coding team

Read full topic
